title: Found a bug with the login theme i think.
body: i logged in, and it kept playing the login theme instead of just stopping like it normally does when you log in, but It was cool. so this bug report was more about how to make this just happen all the time. that would be cool.

replies.body: Do you mean the music was in the client, or that it kept going while the loading for you logging in was loading?
in the client, past the log in screen.
